item.description:
Let's try dinner again. This time to Barnes KBAF. Short 50 nm hop. New restaurant and cheap fuel.... Why not?

(We have a "Poll" going on this website about the best day and time to fly. Most have said Wednesday, so, let's plan on tomorrow. If you haven't filled it out, please do by clicking on the Polls button on the left.)

If we leave by about 5:30, we can enjoy a sunset flight back!

Need a ride? Let's see who's flying or back-seat-flying?
Usually plenty of room

http://www.airnav.com...
item.how_to_find_us: We should all meet at my hangar before we fly out. I'm at building 13. Down driveway enter gates on the right. Two blue hangars, building 13 is closest to rwy.... Then we can leave together... More fun that way :-)
item.why: Good place to eat and fly to. ANY OTHER SUGGESTIONS FOR FLY OUTS???

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Dinner to Barnes ... 5:30, tomorrow. WEDNESDAY
